concept.title: Discover
concept.shortdesc: Welcome to the decentralized web. Access concepts, frequently asked questions and technical shares about decentralized content publishing.

conbody.p: You are currently using the decentralized web (DWeb) on the Interplanetary File System (IPFS).
The content is decentralized, replicated, and its authenticity and provenance are verifiable.
OASIS Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) XML Version 2.0 was used as the source markup language for the website.
This site is independent, unpaid, and for informational purposes only.
